mapper.select: SELECT sub.prno AS `no` , sub.parent_reply AS `parent_reply` , sub.content AS `content` , sub.write_date AS `write_date` , sub.writer_uno AS `writer_uno` , sub.writer_nick_name AS `writer_nick_name` , sub.writer_profile_pic AS `writer_profile_pic` , sub.like_num AS `like_num` , IF(( SELECT COUNT(prl.lno) FROM `program_reply_like` prl WHERE prl.prno = sub.prno AND prl.uno = #{uno} ) > 0, true, false) AS `press_like` , IFNULL(( SELECT COUNT(pr.prno) FROM `program_reply` pr WHERE pr.parent_reply = sub.prno ), 0) AS `reply_num` , ( SELECT `content` FROM `program_reply_view` prv WHERE prv.parent_reply = sub.prno ORDER BY prv.like_num DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS `re_content` FROM ( SELECT * FROM `program_reply_view` WHERE `pno` = #{no} AND `parent_reply` IS NULL ORDER BY `like_num` DESC LIMIT ${num} , 20 ) sub ORDER BY `like_num` DESC, `no`

SELECT sub.prno AS `no`, sub.parent_reply AS `parent_reply`, sub.content AS `content`, sub.write_date AS `write_date`, sub.writer_uno AS `writer_uno`, sub.writer_nick_name AS `writer_nick_name`, sub.writer_profile_pic AS `writer_profile_pic`, sub.like_num AS `like_num` , IF(( SELECT COUNT(prl.lno) FROM `program_reply_like` prl WHERE prl.prno = sub.prno AND prl.uno = #{uno} ) > 0, true, false) AS `press_like` FROM ( SELECT * FROM `program_reply_view` WHERE `parent_reply` = #{no} ORDER BY `like_num` DESC LIMIT ${num} , 20 ) sub ORDER BY `like_num` DESC, `no`
